As indicated by Screen Rant, Aquaman 2 isn't planned to start recording until summer this year. It is relied upon to deliver in 2022, however no different subtleties are yet uncovered by the creators. 
 
The DC Extended Universe is a continually creating spot, which is known for keeping the moviegoing swarm on their total toes. This consolidates James Wan's Aquaman 2, and performer Amber Heard has been nudging her return as Mera. In addition, by and by she's revealed her main piece of that person.

All things considered, fans are eager to plunge once again into the Aquaman establishment with James Wan's impending spin-off. Also, since Warner Bros. has dropped plans for a Trench side project, Aquaman 2 will hold the fate of the property on its shoulders. 
 
She has been building up her job for Aquaman 2, there are a few fans demanding her expulsion from the DCEU. This comes because of her progressing fight in court with ex Johnny Depp, and Depp being terminated from his job in Fantastic Beasts 3. Anyway, Heard and her group have prevented any reports from getting her to abandon Mera, and this new post unquestionably proceeds with that. 
 
Aquaman 2 is right now expected to hit theaters in 2022, so creation may be starting soon. There has been a lot of theory about Amber Heard's part in Aquaman 2 lately.
